title: New Wells Fargo Chief Faces Challenges Beyond Washington
text:
Wells Fargo investors were fearing a bad outcome as the bank’s search for a new chief executive neared its six-month anniversary. They got some immediate relief in the form of Charles Scharf, but the real challenge still lies ahead.

Mr. Scharf is a big fish. He brings a top-notch resume to the new job: Running a wholesale banking business in the form of Bank of New York Mellon; leading a payments technology business in the form of Visa; and steering retail banking at JPMorgan Chase through the financial crisis.

...
description: Wells Fargo investors were fearing a bad outcome as the bank’s search for a new chief executive neared its six-month anniversary. They got some immediate relief in the form of Charles Scharf, but the real challenge still lies ahead.
